page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area is in an interesting position caught between the New Forest and the industrial complex which has sprung on the West side of Southampton Water. The six westmost blocks are almost entirely heathland consisting of scrub with the occasional tree and wet patch so typical of much of this area. The three East most blocks include parts of the Esso Refinery,the biggest installation of its type in the country,and a large residential area which has grown to provide housing and amenities for the workers at the refinery and other associated industries which have grown in its wake. Most of the housing is relatively new although there are a few examples of old foresters cottages still to be seen. Indications are that this area will continue to grow.
